title: Power from the Valley
creator_contributor_role: SEC Public Relations Dept, production company

description: More than 80% of Victoria's electricity comes from brown coal. The film shows coal mining, briquette making, pollution control and the beautification and restoration of nature in the Latrobe Valley as well as shots of the Hazelwood, Morwell, and Yallourn power stations and plants and the plans for Loy Yang.
